thread.title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Farmers Capital Bank Q1 earnings per share $0.75 (April 18)

title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Farmers Capital Bank Q1 earnings per share $0.75 (April 18)
text:
April 19, 2018 / 12:16 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago CORRECTED-BRIEF-Farmers Capital Bank Q1 earnings per share $0.75 (April 18) Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Corrects headline to say Q1 EPS was $0.75, not $0.59. Also corrects third bullet to say adj. eps was for Q4 2017, not Q1 2018) 
April 18 (Reuters) - Farmers Capital Bank Corp: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.75 
* Q4 2017 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE WAS $0.59 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
